Our task overview paper SemEval 2022 task 6: iSarcasmEval, Intended Sarcasm Detection in English and Arabic by Ibrahim Abu Farha, Silviu Oprea, Steven Wilson, and Walid Magdy will appear at SemEval 2022, co-located with NAACL 2022.
Dr. Steven Wilson gave a tutorial on "Preprocessing Social Media Text" at the Istanbul Twitter Community.
